privacyComplianceList: The syllabus can be accessed without an account so no PII is collected unless people join our in person classes. We are a registered charity and regulated in the UK by the Charity Commission and Ofsted.

standardsList: This doesn't quite fit our use case. We align to SFIA mappings for graduation https://sfia-online.org/en.

preventHarm.additionalInfoMechanismProcessesPolicies: For the syllabus, no. It's a syllabus. For our in-person course we check our outcomes and we create a buddy programme to support trainees https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1HtKd6J12ISE5va4fG0fPGIy18ILA0I6jZJS3FFN4DFw/edit?usp=sharing https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SFNpbbFVXE1Lusm5MI7lc51r09_2ecpyFNvKUuAkkFU/edit?usp=sharing https://vimeo.com//650257108#t=2m48s

harassmentProtectionSteps: For the syllabus, no, because it's just a website with no interactions. For our course, we have a code of conduct, a safeguarding lead, safeguarding training, and a personal coach for targeted support sessions for people with social impairments.
